title: Thank you for reporting bugs in v2.42.4
content:
Hi again,

As mentioned in the last version, I did a major programming language migration which would certainly result in some bugs.

Thanks to my lovely users, several big and small bugs were reported and patched in this version (2.42.5).

My apologies to those who were affected. If you still encounter any bugs in this version, please report them to me via email or Discord. I'll try to fix them asap.

You all are awesome and I wish everyone a fantastic day ahead or a good night's sleep.

Love you guys.
Son Nguyen
